msg: add apr_get_home_directory(), teach mod_userdir to use that

author: rbb
msg: Make Win32 compile again by defining APR_INADDR_NONE in apr.hw.

author: trawick
msg: Get the sendfile-avoidance for Tru64 working.

author: rbb
msg: Not all platforms have INADDR_NONE defined by default.  Apache used to
check for this and the define it if needed.  Since APR also needs this
check it makes more sense for APR to just check and export a symobl that
